ON STEROIDS.Definition: used for saying that something is an extreme example or version of something

AVERAGE.Definition: a standard or level that is considered to be typical or usual

EXCEPTIONALLY.Definition: in a way that is much greater than usual, especially in skill, intelligence, quality

INCREDIBLE.Definition: impossible, or very difficult, to believe

AWE-INSPIRING.Definition: causing you to feel great respect or admiration

OUTSTANDING.Definition: clearly very much better than what is usual

PHRASAL VERB.Definition: a phrase that consists of a verb with a preposition or adverb or both, the meaning of which is different from the meaning of its separate parts
